sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词的有"报道，叙述"之意。
means: account ：普通用词，不如report正式，侧重对亲身经历或目睹之事所作的书面或口头的报道或叙述。
report ：正式用词，多指报刊上的报道，强调对情况经过调查或审核后作出的详尽叙述，具有一定权威性。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"演讲，讲话，报告"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: address, speech, lecture, oration, report, talk
means: address ：正式用词，指在庄严隆重的场合作精心准备的演讲或正式演说。
speech ：普通用词，指一般的发言或讲话，可以是事先准备的，也可以是即席的。
oration ：常指在特殊场合，辞藻华丽，形式庄重，旨在激发听众感情的正式演说。
report ：一般是指下级给上级或负责人给委托机关的书面或口头报告。
talk ：常用词，强调非正式讲话，讲话方式一般较为自由。

lj.lj_ly: The committee reported the new tax bill out.
lj.lj_ls: 委员会呈了交新的纳税议案

jx.jx_cn_mean: （对所执行的任务）提出（口头或书面）报告，述职

lj.lj_ly: every movement I made was reported back to him.

means.word_mean: 叙述;讲述
报告;告知
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French reporter (verb), report (noun), from Latin reportare 'bring back', from re- 'back' + portare 'carry'. The sense 'give an account' gave rise to 'submit a formal report', hence 'inform an authority of one's presence' (sense 2, mid 19th cent.) and 'be accountable (to a superior)' (sense 3, late 19th cent.)

encyclopedia.content: 词典解释 及物动词vt. 1.报告[(+to)][+v-ing][+that] He reported that he had seen her. 或He reported seeing her. 他报告说他见到她了。 They reported the movements of the enemy troops to the headquarters. 他们向司令部报告了敌军的动向。 2.报导；记述，描述[O2][O8][O9][+that] It is reported that twenty men were killed in the clash. 据报导，在这次冲突中有二十人被打死。 Two passengers were reported (to be)

entry.def: If you report something that has happened, you tell people about it.

example.ex: They had been called in to clear drains after local people reported a foul smell...
example.tran: 当地居民举报闻到恶臭气味后，他们被叫来清理排水沟。

example.ex: I reported the theft to the police...
example.tran: 我向警方报告了这起盗窃案。

entry.tran: (就某个事件或主题)报告情况，报道
entry.def: If you report on an event or subject, you tell people about it, because it is your job or duty to do so.

example.ex: Many journalists enter the country to report on political affairs...
example.tran: 许多记者进入该国对政治事件进行报道。

example.ex: I'll now call at the vicarage and report to you in due course.
example.tran: 我现在要去教区牧师家拜访，然后适时向你汇报情况。

entry.def: A report is a news article or broadcast which gives information about something that has just happened.

example.ex: With a report on these developments, here's Jim Fish in Belgrade...
example.tran: 这里是吉姆·菲什在贝尔格莱德发来的关于事件进展的报道。

entry.def: A report is an official document which a group of people issue after investigating a situation or event.

example.ex: After an inspection, the inspectors must publish a report.
example.tran: 在视察之后，视察者必须发表一份报告。

example.ex: A report by the Association of University Teachers finds that only 22 per cent of lecturers in our universities are women.
example.tran: 大学教师联合会发表的报告发现只有22%的大学讲师为女性。

entry.def: If you give someone a report on something, you tell them what has been happening.

example.ex: She came back to give us a progress report on how the project is going...
example.tran: 她回来给我们作了关于项目进程的报告。

example.ex: It seemed obvious from his report of that meeting that you were trying to focus suspicion on Mr Hirsch.
example.tran: 从他对那次会面的报告中可以明显看出你正把怀疑的焦点转向赫希先生。

entry.def: If you say that there are reports that something has happened, you mean that some people say it has happened but you have no direct evidence of it.

example.ex: There are unconfirmed reports that two people have been shot in the neighbouring town of Lalitpur...
example.tran: 据报道有两人在勒利德布尔城附近被枪杀，但尚未得到证实。

example.ex: There were no reports of casualties.

entry.def: If someone reports you to a person in authority, they tell that person about something wrong that you have done.

example.ex: His ex-wife reported him to police a few days later...
example.tran: 他的前妻几天后向警方告发了他。

example.ex: The Princess was reported for speeding twice on the same road within a week.
example.tran: 这位公主一周之内在同一路段上两次因超速行驶被告发。

entry.def: If you report to a person or place, you go to that person or place and say that you are ready to start work or say that you are present.

example.ex: According to protocol, he first reported to the Director of the hospital...
example.tran: 根据礼节，他先向医院院长报到。

example.ex: Mr Ashwell has to surrender his passport and report to the police every five days...
example.tran: 阿什维尔先生不得不交出他的护照，并且每隔5天到警察局报到一次。

entry.def: If you say that one employee reports to another, you mean that the first employee is told what to do by the second one and is responsible to them.

example.ex: He reported to a section chief, who reported to a division chief, and so on up the line.
example.tran: 他由组长领导，组长由部门主管领导，如此逐级向上。

entry.def: A school report is an official written account of how well or how badly a pupil has done during the term or year that has just finished.

example.ex: And now she was getting bad school reports.
example.tran: 现在她的学习成绩越来越差。

entry.def: A report is a sudden loud noise, for example the sound of a gun being fired or an explosion.

example.ex: Soon afterwards there was a loud report as the fuel tanks exploded.
example.tran: 不久之后就听到燃料箱爆炸的巨响。

means.word_mean: 1. a written document describing the findings of some individual or group;

sentences.sentence: "this accords with the recent study by Hill and Dale"

means.word_mean: 2. a short account of the news;

sentences.sentence: "the story was on the 11 o'clock news"
"the account of his speech that was given on the evening news made the governor furious"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of informing by verbal report;

sentences.sentence: "he heard reports that they were causing trouble"
"by all accounts they were a happy couple"

means.word_mean: 4. a sharp explosive sound (especially the sound of a gun firing);

sentences.sentence: "they heard a violent report followed by silence"

means.word_mean: 5. a written evaluation of a student's scholarship and deportment;
6. an essay (especially one written as an assignment);

sentences.sentence: "he got an A on his composition"

means.word_mean: 7. the general estimation that the public has for a person;

sentences.sentence: "he acquired a reputation as an actor before he started writing"
"he was a person of bad report"

means.word_mean: 1. to give an account or representation of in words;

sentences.sentence: "Discreet Italian police described it in a manner typically continental"

means.word_mean: 2. announce as the result of an investigation, or announce something to the proper authorities;

sentences.sentence: "Dozens of incidents of wife beatings are reported daily in this city"
"The team reported significant advances in their research"

means.word_mean: 3. announce one's presence;

sentences.sentence: "I report to work every day at 9 o'clock"

means.word_mean: 4. make known to the authorities;

sentences.sentence: "One student reported the other to the principal"

means.word_mean: 5. be responsible for reporting the details of, as in journalism;

sentences.sentence: "The cub reporter covered New York City"

means.word_mean: 6. complain about; make a charge against;

auth_sentence.res_content: China's censored media doesn't report the battles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: China's censored media doesn't report the battles.

auth_sentence.res_content: The team report their findings in the journal Nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The team report their findings in the journal Nature.

auth_sentence.content: Scottish Natural Heritage called the report an important milestone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scottish Natural Heritage called the report an important milestone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scottish Natural Heritage called the report an important milestone.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

means.word_mean: 报告, 报道

sentences.en: All reports must be sent in by the end of this week.
sentences.cn: 所有的报告必须在本星期以前交齐。

sentences.en: My daughter got a good report last term.
sentences.cn: 我女儿上学期成绩出色。

sentences.en: Report has it that the ballet will visit England before long.
sentences.cn: 据说这个芭蕾舞团不久将访问英国。

means.word_mean: 报告; 报道

sentences.en: The committee will report at twelve o'clock.
sentences.cn: 委员会将在12点钟提出报告。

sentences.en: She reported the success of a new experiment.
sentences.cn: 她报告说一次新的试验成功了。

sentences.en: He reported seeing a new star.
sentences.cn: 他报告说看见一颗新星。

sentences.en: The newspaper reported that prices were going up.
sentences.cn: 报纸报道说物价正在上涨。

means.word_mean: 公布; 宣告; 当记者

sentences.en: What time do we have to report?
Police reported the closure of the road.
sentences.cn: 警方宣布那条道路禁止通行。

means.word_mean: 报到

sentences.en: All the representatives must report themselves on time.
sentences.cn: 所有的代表都必须准时报到。

means.word_mean: 告发, 举报

sentences.en: They reported what they had seen.
sentences.cn: 他们把看到的情况作了举报。

jushi.english: Report has it that the ballet will visit China before long.
jushi.chinese: 据说这个芭蕾舞团不久将访问中国。

jushi.english: I have only reports to go on.
jushi.chinese: 我的依据只是谣传而已。
